data.title: Justin Timberlake & Jessica Bielâ€™s Best Parenting Moments
data.meta_description: In honor of Justin Timberlake's 42nd birthday, we're counting down our favorite parenting moments from him and his wife Jessica Biel.
data.text:
The Big Announcement

Letâ€™s start from the very beginning. Timberlake shared the news that Biel was expecting Silas by posting a sweet, candid photo on Instagram. The singer kissed Bielâ€™s pregnant belly and captioned the post:

â€œThank you EVERYONE for the Bday wishes! This year, Iâ€™m getting the GREATEST GIFT EVER. CANâ€™T WAIT. #BoyOrGirl #YouNeverKnow #WeDontEvenKnow #WeAreTakingBets.â€

Silas Randall Timberlake was born April 8, 2015 and was named after Timberlakeâ€™s father, Randall.

Baby Number 2

The couple welcomed their son Phineas in 2020, during the COVID pandemic. In June 2021, Biel shared an update on Dax Shepardâ€™s Armchair Expert podcast. â€œI had, like, a secret COVID baby. It wasnâ€™t like it was supposed to be a secret. It was just COVID happened, and then I went to Montana with my family and never left,â€ she said.

Timberlake shared the first photo of his youngest on Fatherâ€™s Day 2021, writing, â€œBeing a dad is better than I ever could have imagined. Thankful to my dads and my grandfathers for leading the way, making the sacrifices for me to live out my dreams, and for teaching me that REAL LIFE happens in all the little moments. Happy Fatherâ€™s Day to all the dads out there!!!â€

Learning Self-Care

Like all busy parents, Biel struggles with taking time for herself. â€œI have to admit, I often put myself at the bottom of the totem pole of my family,â€ Biel told SheKnows at the NYC launch of KinderMed in Nov. 2022, which she co-created with Jeremy Adams. â€œIâ€™m still working on finding that balance for myself,â€ she confessed. â€œIâ€™m not great at it.â€

She added that parenting â€œsometimes feels like youâ€™re running a marathon and itâ€™s uphill both ways,â€ and that some days there are moments when it â€œfeels like itâ€™s swallowing you whole.â€

We can definitely relate!

The Best Halloween Costumes

Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlake arenâ€™t regular parents. Theyâ€™re cool parents. And by that, we mean that the couple happily dressed up as Professor Dumbledore and Professor McGonagall for Halloween, alongside Silas, dressed as Harry Potter, and their 2-year-old son Phineas, who went as Hedwig.

â€œLast night at MAGIC hour âœ¨ğŸ§™ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸â€ Biel captioned the post. You know the saying â€” the family who dresses up as various Harry Potter characters stays together.

The Best Workout Buddies

Justin Timberlake had an adorable addition to his workout routine when he did push-ups with Silas on his back. The video, which was shot by Biel, was impressive to say the least.

â€œShaking off those leftovers likeâ€¦ Hope everyone had a great Thanksgiving! ğŸ¥ @jessicabiel,â€ Timberlake wrote in 2017.

Christmas Traditions

In order to make the holidays less â€œoverwhelming,â€ Biel and Timberlake have special holiday traditions.

â€œI find that Christmas is kind of overwhelming for kids,â€ Biel told PEOPLE in Dec. 2022. â€œItâ€™s a lot of pressure. Thereâ€™s a lot of eyeballs on them, and theyâ€™ve got a lot of stuff to do. So, I like to slow-roll it.â€

They open presents slowly. â€œSure, open one thing,â€ she explained. â€œWe donâ€™t have to open anything else until tonight, and that sometimes happens for us.â€

But where they celebrate the holidays always changes. â€œWe spend Christmas all over the place,â€ she said. â€œWe never know where weâ€™re going to be. We have no tradition really around it. Sometimes weâ€™re in snow, sometimes weâ€™re by the ocean. We have no rhyme or reason currently as to where we should be or where weâ€™re going to be.â€

Being in the Moment

Biel and Timberlake are both very busy, but when it comes to their kids, they like to stay in the moment.

â€œYou cannot do both at the same time,â€ Biel said on a Dec. 2022 episode of The Drew Barrymore Show. â€œWhen youâ€™re wrestling on the floor, youâ€™re wrestling on the floor. Donâ€™t answer the phone. Donâ€™t look at a work thing. Donâ€™t text somebody. Donâ€™t do any of it. You are wrestling on the floor,â€ she adds with a laugh.

â€œThatâ€™s what we do in my household. A lot of wrestling,â€ she added.

Such good advice!

The Sweetest Instagram Tributes

Youâ€™ll be hard-pressed to find a celebrity couple who writes declarations quite as sweet on Motherâ€™s and Fatherâ€™s Day. The two love to pay tribute to one another as parents with loving Instagram posts every year.

â€œTo my husband who I watch with awe everyday as he guides and teaches, encourages and supports, and above all, LOVES the sh*t, out of his own young man,â€ Biel wrote in 2018.

Timberlake returned the favor on Motherâ€™s Day in 2019. â€œJess, you are the glue that holds our family together and Iâ€™m so grateful to be your Huzâ€¦ I LOVE YOU! Every day should be Motherâ€™s Day!!â€

Reading For Fun AND Value

In 2018, Biel took to Instagram to share a recommendation for a pop-up book she was reading to Silas that offers a powerful message to young kids. The Color Monster helps children unpack all of their feelings â€” from happiness to fear â€” and allows them to have a better understanding of those confusing feelings.

â€œFor #readabookday, I wanted to share The Color Monster by @annallenas!â€ Biel wrote. â€œThis book helps kids deal with confusing emotions AKA dealing with being a human being. We love it.â€

And we love a good book with such a helpful message!

Teaching Their Kids Important Life Lessons

After the horrific murder of George Floyd in 2020, Timberlake took to Instagram to share that he was teaching his son about discrimination.

â€œWe try to teach our son to love and to respect everyone â€” we teach him that all people are all created equal, and that no one should be treated differently because of the color of their skin,â€ the singer wrote in a post. â€œWe teach him this because one day, he will go on to teach his kids the same. Itâ€™s a cycle. And right now, as we all work to undo generations of discrimination that have plagued our system and our communities across this countryâ€¦Iâ€™m reminded today that the first lessons start at home.â€

Keeping It Real About Parenthood

Biel hasnâ€™t shied away from being honest about the low points of motherhood â€” which is incredibly refreshing to hear as fellow parents.

â€œThis might sound really terrible, but itâ€™s the truth. Having a child, I have never experienced more emotions in all my life, anger being one of them,â€ she told The Daily Telegraph in 2017. â€œSimply put, sometimes your two-year-old makes you crazy.â€

Yup, a big amen to that!

Their 10th Anniversary

Timberlake shared the sweetest words to his wife on their 10th anniversary on Oct. 19, 2022, which is a wonderful example to his sons.

â€œ10 years ainâ€™t enough! You make me a better husband and father every day!â€ he wrote on Instagram. â€œI love you so much you beautiful human! Run it back!â€

She responded with her own post, writing, â€œBeing married to you is the adventure of a lifetime! Run it back, baby. RUN IT BACK. I love you.â€

What beautiful tributes of love! Their kids are lucky, indeed.
